personalInfo.name: Abner Rodrigues
personalInfo.headline: Senior Software Engineer | Full Stack | React | Typescript | Micro frontends | Java | Springboot | Git
personalInfo.about: I'm a Senior Front-end Developer focused on building scalable, mission-critical interfaces using React. I really care about performance, system stability, and delivering high-quality code. Currently working at Liberty Health, delivering the billing software for São Paulo's public health network. It's a massive project used in over 70 healthcare facilities, where I deal with complex micro-frontends and heavy business logic to help keep the public health system running. I also bring a solid Full Stack background (Java/Spring), which helps me bridge the gap between UI and Backend to build more resilient products.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
experience.description: I specialize in building large-scale, resilient Front-end applications. Currently, I am driving the front-end development for a high-traffic healthcare platform active in the public sector. I architect solutions using React and Micro-frontends, focusing on scalability and code reusability. The system handles intricate billing rules, requiring me to implement complex validation and logic on the client side while maintaining high performance.

experience.title: Software Engineer II
experience.description: Worked on software evolution and maintenance.

experience.title: Software Engineer I
experience.description: Full stack development with focus on Java/Spring and React.

education.degree: Curso Superior de Tecnologia (CST), Análise e desenvolvimento de sistemas
